title: 86/326/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 June 1986 approving an addition to the programme for the beef and meat processing sector in Ireland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 June 1986
approving an addition to the programme for the beef and meat processing sector in Ireland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the English text is authentic)
(86/326/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the programme for the beef and meat processing sector in Ireland forwarded by the Irish Government on 14 January 1986 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 and supplemented by letter dated 14 February 1986 is hereby approved, subject to the reservation set out in the recitals above.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 June 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 372, 31. 12. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 106, 28. 4. 1979, p. 47.
